message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
You're being too greedy! I'll give you a decent share, but you'll have to negotiate harder to get more.
Okay, I'll meet you halfway. 6000 for me, 4000 for you. Let's end this already!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. You'll have to do better than that!
I'm willing to give you a larger share to get this done. Let's settle for 4500 for me and 5500 for you. I'm not willing to go lower than that.
